item.title: CCGs and WPCs via the medium of OAs
item.description: As I was eating lunch this afternoon, I spotted a conversation between @JoeReddington and @MySociety whizz past in Tweetdeck. I traced the conversation back to the beginning and found this request for data: I'm looking for a dataset that shows which UK constituencies are in which NHS trust areas. Anyone? — retired account (@retired10072015) September 14, 2014 I’ve been doing a lot of playing with geographic data recently whileÂ preparing to release a site making it easier to get GeoJSON boundaries of various areas in the UK.
